title: Must be level 6 to post?
body: When i try to reply to post or create a discussion i get "You must be above level 6...", but I've been above level 6 since about October of 2014. I read around posting a question about it unlocks it but I wouldn't know until after this. Any other ideas?

replies.body: If you don't use the boards for a while, your Boards and Summoner profiles can fall out of sync. This post seems to have synced them up again, so you should be good to go! Happy posting!
